channel.title: Ode to mitb
channel.description:
Back in da days before I was a teenager Before I knew java, when I was just a runescaper I was chillin' and illin', didn't know what to do When a boy named moparisthebest came and showed me some moves He linked me 2 a site dat was rather rad All da fly motherfuckers though I was rather sad
Ints, handlers and booleans too Now I've got tha' mad badass motherfucking street crew Compile that up your java, COMPILE THAT UP YOUR ASS! Just put it in your client.java, now that ain't no task Introduced me to hacking and cracking and all the rest Just like a silab in a skimpy ass dress
Now that was 2006, when I had no dix Now it's 2009 and I know all tha' tricks I can hack and crack like I'm so fly And all my school friends just say 'why? why? why?' But they'll never know what mitb gave to me He gave me a gift, costs nothing, it's free That gift is called love, R-U-N-E-S-C-A-P to the E
Now this song's to remember all the fallen heroes They came so high just to become all zeroes Remember all the boys who flew so high Those motherfuckers, they were all sooo fly Now I'm not talkin' about sL or any of that I'm talking bout the rulereric type, ye a big prat Remember these boys, they all shined on me Remember xxlegitxx, rulereric, xerozcheez and JAY-DEE-BEE They've done alot for da community Yet they still get treated like a big impurity So on a holiday just sit down and pray For these fallen legends.... I wish they'd stay
Don't forget what you came here for, all the hacks and the cracks Your best bot was as good as a bad carjack All the skills and pills couldn't jack you out of da grave To the keyboard and mouse you've become a slave Writing hours of code, you've still got a chode And then you ask 'WhERe 2 BlOw My LoAd?' I ain't here for a fucking stringwrapper I'm a motherfucking MC not a shit rapper My knowledge is as vast as a semaphore But I promise that I ain't no fuckwhore
Forget yourself in this big game Wasted four years of my life, now that's a shame However If I could do it all again I'd do it at a drop of a pin Or maybe for your RS pin Thank you moparisthebest, it's been a good run Thank you moparisthebest, I've had alot of fun

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

TheBeanie:

Isnt rap supposed to make sence?

Rap is the beat of the street.
Not the size of the feat.
You know what I’m laying down for you here?
Just some holmsome beats no need to fear.

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Yo, the name is Batty
The logic is erratic,
Potato in a jacket,
Toys in the attic,
I rock and I ramble,
My brain is scrambled,
Rap like an animal but I’m a mammal

I been brain-fried, electrified, infected and injectified,
Vivosectified and fed pesticides,
My face is all cut up,
Cos my radar’s all shut up
Nurse I need a check-up from the neck up,
I’m Batty

They used and abused me,
Battered and bruised me,
Red wires green wires stuck em’ right through me,
So hear my Batty word,
And excersize a little prudence,
When dealing with humans,

Read full topic

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

pko times up, it’s time to pay
u’ve owed me drug money for 12 days
I’m coming for you, I’m florida bound
you’d be wise to spend that money on greyhound
cuz I’m comin fast, and im shooting too
i got tha 12 guage ready to blast you
But not until i stop at ya grandma’s crib first
when i’m done they’ll skip the doctor and call the hearse
you think you could jack me and my dank
but you forgot one thing,
I’ll fuck you with a rake

k I give up now i suck at this lol!

Read full topic

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

some bitch named maluxia frontin on moparisthebest
i dont like his words he aint nothin but a pest
he can be my guest, take a gat to the chest
where you’re standin will become the place that you rest
you think you can rap, you think you can rhyme
bitch you forgot about me im way past your time
the realist spitta from the south, pko
i bet you just realized i fucked ya hoe

sorry i had to get rid of some G-ness, i dont really have anything against you

Read full topic

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

His name is pookey but they all call him pooks
He ain’t in your fucking history books
He listens to ska every day of the week
Pedo smile, he’s lookin’ like a freak!
The Mighty Bosstones are what he cooks
Motherfucker he’s getting all the looks
From all da boys with all da toys
Motherfucker I’m about to make some noise!

best I could come up with mate

Read full topic

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:287848”]I liked it, except for two things.

xerozcheez stole a lot of bank and paypal passwords from people, and JDB tried his best to completely destroy the forums, both of which are complete bastard things to do and would definitely remove them from the ‘legends’ category (not that they really did anything to become legends in the first place)

All in all though, great job. :)[/quote]

Oh, that whole bit was a joke ;D ;). Yea I remember something about xerozcheez tricking people to go onto some page that had this nazi-applet thingo that would steal the firefox saved password files. As for the rest well they all just ragequit’d l0l.

Read full topic

item.title: Ode to mitb
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

Back in da days before I was a teenager
Before I knew java, when I was just a runescaper
I was chillin’ and illin’, didn’t know what to do
When a boy named moparisthebest came and showed me some moves
He linked me 2 a site dat was rather rad
All da fly motherfuckers though I was rather sad

Ints, handlers and booleans too
Now I’ve got tha’ mad badass motherfucking street crew
Compile that up your java, COMPILE THAT UP YOUR ASS!
Just put it in your client.java, now that ain’t no task
Introduced me to hacking and cracking and all the rest
Just like a silab in a skimpy ass dress

Now that was 2006, when I had no dix
Now it’s 2009 and I know all tha’ tricks
I can hack and crack like I’m so fly
And all my school friends just say ‘why? why? why?’
But they’ll never know what mitb gave to me
He gave me a gift, costs nothing, it’s free
That gift is called love, R-U-N-E-S-C-A-P to the E

Now this song’s to remember all the fallen heroes
They came so high just to become all zeroes
Remember all the boys who flew so high
Those motherfuckers, they were all sooo fly
Now I’m not talkin’ about sL or any of that
I’m talking bout the rulereric type, ye a big prat
Remember these boys, they all shined on me
Remember xxlegitxx, rulereric, xerozcheez and JAY-DEE-BEE
They’ve done alot for da community
Yet they still get treated like a big impurity
So on a holiday just sit down and pray
For these fallen legends… I wish they’d stay

Don’t forget what you came here for, all the hacks and the cracks
Your best bot was as good as a bad carjack
All the skills and pills couldn’t jack you out of da grave
To the keyboard and mouse you’ve become a slave
Writing hours of code, you’ve still got a chode
And then you ask ‘WhERe 2 BlOw My LoAd?’
I ain’t here for a fucking stringwrapper
I’m a motherfucking MC not a shit rapper
My knowledge is as vast as a semaphore
But I promise that I ain’t no fuckwhore

Forget yourself in this big game
Wasted four years of my life, now that’s a shame
However If I could do it all again I’d do it at a drop of a pin
Or maybe for your RS pin
Thank you moparisthebest, it’s been a good run
Thank you moparisthebest, I’ve had alot of fun

Read full topic
